homePage-rules.rule1: 1. Provide Accurate Information: Ensure that the information you provide in the incident report is accurate and complete to the best of your knowledge.
homePage-rules.rule2: 2. Choose the Right Category: Select the appropriate category for the incident report. Categorizing the incident correctly helps in its timely resolution.
homePage-rules.rule3: 3. Include Detailed Description: Describe the incident in detail, including when, where, and how it occurred. Be specific and avoid vague language.
homePage-rules.rule4: 4. Avoid Duplications: Check if the incident has already been reported to avoid duplication. If it has, you can add additional information to the existing report.
